title: Zwift adds Neokyo map to Makuri Island! Plus Clubs, Challenges & More!
content:
Zwift has a lot of updates and new challenge and maps launching now and over the next few months, offering more racing, better training, and an all-new Neokyo urban expansion on the Makuri Island map. Expansion of Makuri Islands Neokyo is the newest expansion to Makuri Islands, almost doubling the amount of roads originally created

The post Zwift adds Neokyo map to Makuri Island! Plus Clubs, Challenges & More! appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Tyler Benedict
